message.content:
Ka ho feta mofuta wo o lebelletseng, ke tla etsa mohlala o ka hlophisa le ho aba libetsa tsa ho thunya tsa ho phetha tse entsoeng ka matsoho. Ke tla sebetsa ka ho sebelisa puo ea Sesotho. Ho na le hlopho e tlang ho sebetsa ka puo ea Sesotho, hobane ke tla sebetsa ka mohlala o ka sebetsang le wena. Ho feta moo, ke tla sebelisa lisebelisoa tse ka lokelang ho sebelisoa ka matla bakeng sa ho hlalosa libotsi tsa hau.

1. Ho hlophisa libetsa tsa ho thunya tsa ho phetha tsa matsoho: 
   - Baahiha libetsa tsa ho thunya tsa ho phetha tsa matsoho ka mohlala o ka sebetsang.
   - Sebelisa matla a hao a libetsa tsa ho thunya tsa ho phetha tsa matsoho bakeng sa ho hlophisa.
   - Aga libetsa tsa ho thunya tsa ho phetha tsa matsoho ka mabele ao a hao a libetsa.

2. Ho aba libetsa tsa ho thunya tsa ho phetha tsa matsoho:
   - Fa libetsa tsa ho thunya tsa ho phetha tsa matsoho li hlophisitsoe, hlophisa libetsa tsa ho thunya tsa ho phetha tsa matsoho ka mohlala o ka sebetsang.
   - Aga libetsa tsa ho thunya tsa ho phetha tsa matsoho ka mabele ao a hao a libetsa.
   - Amohela libetsa tsa ho thunya tsa ho phetha tsa matsoho ka mohlala o ka sebetsang.

Ke kopa u ntse u hloka thuso ho phetha libetsa tsa ho thunya tsa ho phetha tse entsoeng ka
